question: Who of the following inaugurated 4th International Dharma Dhamma Conference?
explanation: President Ram Nath Kovind inaugurated a three-day International Dharma-Dhamma conference at Rajgir in Bihar. The conference has been jointly organized by India Foundation, Nalanda University, Ministry of External Affairs, Asean-India and Vietnamese Buddhist Sangha. The inaugural session was chaired by our President. The conference was attended by Sri Lanka's foreign Minister Tilak Marapana.
